requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 / Fedora 20 / Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / 9800GTX / Radeon HD 3xxx. OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 / Fedora 21 / Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850. OpenGL 4.x+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 11
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / Intel Iris Pro 5200 / Radeon HD 3xxx
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 12
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 - 64 bits *
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: *32 bits systems are not officially supported, but should work if configured to provide 3Gb of user-mode address space.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 / 11 - 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
